title: Protect Your MCP Tools With Auth0 FGA in TypeScript
partialText: Learn how to secure your Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools using Auth0 FGA and TypeScript. Implement relationship-based access control for AI applications.

title: Auth0 Agent Skills Now Available: Production-Ready Authentication for AI Coding Assistants
partialText: Auth0 Agent Skills are now available, giving AI coding assistants the knowledge to implement Auth0 correctly across any framework

title: Maximizing the Reach and Impact of AI Agents for Nonprofits
partialText: How to safely deploy AI agents to scale your mission.

title: From Storefronts to AI Agents: The Next Evolution of Retail Commerce
partialText: How to secure agentic commerce interactions with Auth0’s Auth for MCP.

title: The Revenue Potential of Shared Accounts With Fine-Grained Authorization (FGA)
partialText: Explore three B2C use cases where Fine-Grained Authorization (FGA) turns security checkboxes into revenue levers for streaming, gaming, and e-commerce.

title: Why Your AI Agents Need an Identity Layer: Lessons from OWASP Top 10 for Agentic Applications
partialText: Discover why an identity layer is the best way to stop goal hijacking and tool misuse while keeping your system safe if an agent fails.

title: How Advanced Customizations for Universal Login (ACUL) Helps You Build Seamless Auth Experiences
partialText: ACUL gives engineering teams the freedom to build branding-aligned, logic-driven authentication flows using their own design systems.

title: Inside OpenFGA's Improved ListObjects Algorithm: A Streaming Pipeline Traversal
partialText: Learn how OpenFGA turns an authorization model into a concurrent, backpressure-aware pipeline that streams results as it traverses relationship graphs.

title: Federated Identity vs. Single Sign-On: Key Differences
partialText: A deep dive into the differences between Single Sign-On (SSO) and Federated Identity, covering concepts, protocols, and implementation nuances.

title: You Talked, We Listened: How Your Feedback Shaped Our New B2B Plans
partialText: Discover how Auth0 is improving B2B plan flexibility with new Enterprise Connection options and M2M token add-ons based on developer feedback.
